name: cost_per_vaccine_dose
citation: Routh et al. (2017) Cost Evaluation of a Government-Conducted Oral Cholera Vaccination Campaignâ€”Haiti
column6: Total campaign cost per dose around USD 2.90 in Haiti 2013; default uses rounded illustrative value.

name: cost_per_orc_treatment
citation: Illustrative planning assumption for rapid scenario analysis
notes: No single globally transferable unit cost; should be replaced with context-specific ORS/ORC costing.

name: cost_per_ctc_treatment
citation: Illustrative planning assumption for rapid scenario analysis
notes: No single globally transferable unit cost; should be replaced with local CTC costing.

name: dw_symptomatic
citation: Global Burden of Disease diarrhoea disability weights (moderate episode range includes ~0.188)
notes: Default uses a moderate symptomatic diarrhoeal disability proxy for cholera.

name: duration_symptomatic_days
notes: Replace with context- and age-specific clinical assumptions where available.

name: yll_per_death
citation: Illustrative years-of-life-lost assumption for simple comparative analyses
notes: Replace with age-structured YLL calculations where data allow.
